titleStmt.title: The humble desires and propositions of the Lords and Commons in Parliament tendered to His Majestie, Feb. 1 and His Maiesties gracious answer and propositions, Febr. 3, 1642 [i.e. 1643].
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

titleStmt.title: The humble desires and propositions of the Lords and Commons in Parliament tendered to His Majestie, Feb. 1 and His Maiesties gracious answer and propositions, Febr. 3, 1642 [i.e. 1643].
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Husbands, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: "Die Lun√¶, 6 Februar. 6, 1642. It is this day ordered by the Commons in Parliament assembled that the propositions from both Houses, and His Majesties answer unto them this day received, be forthwith printed and published: H. Elsynge, Cler. Parl. D. Com."
Identified on film as Wing E1555 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
